turn.2: Arrondissement of Périgueux The arrondissement of Périgueux is an arrondissement of France in the Dordogne department in the Nouvelle-Aquitaine region.

turn.10: At the January 2017 reorganisation of the arrondissements of Dordogne, it gained 21 communes from the arrondissement of Bergerac, and it lost 28 communes to the arrondissement of Nontron and 22 communes to the arrondissement of Sarlat-la-Canéda.
turn.12: As a result of the reorganisation of the cantons of France which came into effect in 2015, the borders of the cantons are no longer related to the borders of the arrondissements.
